item.title: ESP8266 Deploying Micropython and Using REPL
item.description: ESP8266 The ESP8266 is a low-cost Wi-Fi microchip with full TCP/IP stack and microcontroller capability produced by Espressif Systems. One of the coolest things about this cip is it can run Micropython. If you are new to programming or hardware/embedded systems and want to get into those, ESP8266 is a good way to get started.
